elements.text: When eating out with your friends, you feel self-conscious about how you now move and eat slower than before your diagnosis. Your friends are already done with their food, and you can see them watching you closely. You look over at them, and they appear to be...

elements.name: Dining Out_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
